query: can window.open open and not active

results.p: The standard popup-blocker logic contained in most browsers these days will block any calls to window.open() that are not the direct result of a user action.

results.t: Should You Keep Your Windows Open When It's Hot? - GreenMatch
Window.open( ) is not working when browser is inactive state
results.p: Apr 22, 2024 — Solution 1: I believe this is a modern security feature of browsers. Most browsers will not allow windows to be opened without direct input from the user.
